name: Reminiscence (LockedUpStudio)
description:
You play as sick child alone in the hospital ward where you have been living for a long time. Your happy memories from a much simpler time kept your hope up and drawing them out fueled you to keep going and survive. 

When you wake up you notice a strange ambience. Everything is quiet and everyone is gone. As you look around you see... something disturbing...

Reminiscence is a horror game that was created as a vertical slice by six students in the Game Design program at Uppsala University. It was presented and displayed at Gotland Game Conference 2018.
